title: Naomi Watts looks in high spirits as she takes her pooch for a stroll in New York City
text:
She's a busy Hollywood actress with a career spanning more than thirty years.

And Naomi Watts looked in high spirits as she took her dog for a stroll during a relaxed outing in New York City on Monday.

The actress, 51, cut a stylish figure for the day, donning khaki jacket with a grey top and blue, animal print leggings.

Out and about: Naomi Watts, 51, looked in high spirits as she took her dog for a stroll during a relaxed outing in New York City on Monday

Wearing her platinum blonde locks in a relaxed bob, Naomi also sported baby pink sunglasses and a brown handbag.

Carrying her pet pooch in one hand, the King Kong star completed her look with a pair of white trainers.

Born in Kent, Naomi spent much of her youth living in Australia where she first established her career in the film business.

Naomi is mother to Sasha, twelve, and Samuel Kai, 10, with ex-husband Liev Schreiber.

Fashion: The actress cut a stylish figure for the day, donning khaki jacket with a grey top and blue, animal print leggings

In August, she talked openly about the couples break-up to Harper's Bazaar.

The actress said she and Liev - who never married during their 11-year relationship - are 'better friends' now than when they were together.

'Liev and I always knew we had to put the kids first and that, no matter what, we would respect each other and take care of each other in the best way going forward for the benefit of our children,' she said.

Style: Wearing her platinum blonde locks in a relaxed bob, Naomi also sported baby pink sunglasses and a brown handbag

Casual: The King Kong star completed her look with a pair of white trainers while she listened to music on her phone

Early days: Born in Kent, Naomi spent much of her youth living in Australia where she first established her career in the film business

'We're easy with each other and we want the best for each other. Our friendship is better now than it ever was.'

Naomi wished her former flamer Liev a happy birthday earlier this month as the actor turned 52.

The actress shared a heartwarming photo to Instagram of her ex enjoying some quality time with their two kids, writing Happy Birthday @lievshreiber' alongside it.
